p: H 2O 2 profiling in wheat cv. BT-Schomburgk (thermosusceptible) during pollination stage showed maximum accumulation (2.8 μM/g FW) in response to T 2, whereas minimum accumulation (2.56 μM/g FW) was under control condition. Similarly, H 2O 2 profiling during grain-filling showed maximum accumulation (3.25 μM/g FW) under T 2, whereas minimum accumulation (2.95 μM/g FW) was observed under control condition. Significant variations (p ≤ 0.05) were observed in the accumulation of H 2O 2 in both the contrasting wheat cvs. during grain-filling stage under differential HS.
